about_the_game:
You are a cube! Your friends are cubes! Your enemies are cubes! Now wrestle!

Welcome to Cubic Wrestling the ultimate free-for-all wrestling mayhem where cubes battle it out for glory! You and your friends are cube-shaped competitors fighting in a wild, physics-driven arena where every slam, spin, and stack can make or break your victory. Knock your opponents off the stage, stack their cubes for power-ups, and use a mix of fast-paced moves to dominate the match. With Twitch integration, real-life viewers become part of the action, influencing the crowd and even dropping in-game items! Customize your cube with hundreds of skins and accessories, and climb the ranks to become the ultimate Hypercube Champion!

You and your friends are cube-shaped competitors fighting in a wild, physics-driven arena where every slam, spin, and stack can make or break your victory. With Twitch integration, real-life viewers become part of the action, influencing the crowd and even dropping in-game items! Customize your cube with hundreds of skins and accessories, and climb the ranks to become the ultimate Hypercube Champion!
name: Cubic Wrestling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 / Intel i3-10100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 460 / Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are a cube! Your friends are cubes! Your enemies are cubes! Now wrestle! In Cubic Wrestling, fight friends in wild arenas, stack defeated cubes for power-ups, and win the crowd with chaotic moves. Twitch viewers join the fun, cheering or booing live!
